CmdLine: cd /tmp &&     curl -LO https://bitbucket.org/ariya/phantomjs/downloads/phantomjs-2.1.1-linux-x86_64.tar.bz2 &&     tar jxf phantomjs-2.1.1-linux-x86_64.tar.bz2 &&     mv phantomjs-2.1.1-linux-x86_64/bin/phantomjs /usr/local/bin &&     rm -rf phantomjs-2.1.1-linux-x86_64.tar.bz2 phantomjs-2.1.1-linux-x86_64
Commands.Name: run
